name: DeepSeaCollector
description:
This game was made for the VimJam game jam. I recommend playing in full screen!

You and Captain James have finally found the secret water temple you have both been longing for. You will have to traverse the temple to find your loot by avoiding the fish that live there, and finding keys to open old gates. Once you have collected a treasure you will have to bring it back to Captain James for him to reel it back up.

Have fun!

Controls:

Space - Grab/Release

WASD - Movement

The hook moves by itself and rocks depending where you're moving.
